message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be invaluable to your business. While I can't disclose the exact details without a non-disclosure agreement, I can assure you its value is significantly more than $1500000.  I'm willing to offer it to you at a price that reflects this potential, but also allows for a mutually beneficial transaction. I'm open to discussing your specific needs and how this product can enhance your operation.  Please let me know if you'd like to explore this further.
